law.catch_line: Licensing by endorsement of persons from other states.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 6, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 256, sec. 10, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 337, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 183, sec. 8
